Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl

Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BasicRestfulClient
    Provides an API for communicating with RESTful web services.
    RestfulJsonMapper
    This implementation of RestfulMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources for JSON message types.
    RestfulJsonSession
    Concrete implementation of RestfulSession for web services which send responses back as JSON.
    RestfulNameValueMapper
    This implementation of ObjectMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources for name-value pair message types.
    RestfulNameValueModelMap
    Concrete implementation of RestfulModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource for name-value pair message types.
    RestfulSession
    Session implementation for communicating with a RESTful web service using domain objects.
    RestfulStringModelMap
    Concrete implementation of RestfulModelMap representing a domain model instance mapped to a RESTful web service resource for JSON and XML message types.
    RestfulXmlMapper
    This implementation of ObjectMapper provides methods to map domain models to RESTful web service resources for XML message types.
    RestfulXmlSession
    Concrete implementation of RestfulSession for web services which send responses back as XML.
    SharedSecretAuthentication
    Used for token-based/shared-secret authentication.

Package com.clarionmedia.infinitum.rest.impl Description

Provides concrete implementations for the RESTful client framework.
